title: Zika Virus Transmission and Climate Change

content.question: Based on the pathways shown in the diagram, which of the following best describes how climate change will most likely increase the transmission rates of the Zika virus?

choices.label: A decrease in the number of baboons will lead to an increase in human exposure to the virus.
Expanded mosquito ranges will increase human exposure to the virus.
A shift in the human population to urban areas will decrease transmission between people.
Desertification will cause an increase in the number of monkeys and chimpanzees, which will decrease the overall number of cases of Zika.

content.answer: Expanded mosquito ranges will increase human exposure to the virus.
